title: Perrine Monogatari
synopsis: Perrine travels across Europe with her mother, a photographer, in a cabin drawn by a donkey. They are heading to a small village in northern France, the home of Perrine's dead father.
characters: ['Paindavoine, Perrine', 'Man on the bike', 'Paindavoine, Bilfran', 'Police Man', 'Old lady', 'Inn Proprietor', 'Fanfani, Pietro', 'Narrator', "Sheep's Boy", 'Baron Praga']
voices: ['Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Iwao, Kinshirou', 'Tsujimura, Mahito', 'Ooki, Tamio', 'Shibusawa, Utako', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi']
